entity.name: Robert Mueller
entity.description: Robert Swan Mueller III is an American attorney who served as the sixth Director of the Federal Bureau of Investigation from 2001 to 2013.

text:
Fact:

Robert Mueller’s office deleted 19,000 text messages between Lisa Page and her lover Peter Strzok

How is that not obstruction of justice?

What were they trying to cover up?

We still don’t know.

And MSNBC just hired Lisa Page.

🤔
